name: The Hanging Tree
description:
You just got hung up and now you are stuck with a knot loop around your neck. The rope which killed you is now your way to escape from hell.

-- IMPORTANT -- If you have performance problem with in-game browser or want the best graphics, try the executable build as it helps

-- Update 07/10

We improved branch detection and air-control to help you grasp the controls of our game

--

Play with keyboard and mouse or Gamepad

Controls can be found in the menu

Made during the LD47 event - Stuck in a loop
